organization.fullName: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

identificationModule.briefTitle: A Study of SYS6020 Injection in Refractory Active Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Phase I Clinical Study of BCMA Chimeric Antigen Receptor T Cell（SYS6020）Injection in Refractory Active Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Patients

leadSponsor.name: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This study aimed to observe the safety and tolerability of SYS6020 in adult participants with refractory active systemic lupus erythematosus, determine the recommended dose (RD) that may be explored for subsequent studies, and preliminly evaluate the clinical efficacy of this product,and explore the pharmacokinetics and immunogenicity of SYS6020 injection in those participants.

interventions.name: SYS6020
interventions.description: BCMA Chimeric Antigen Receptor T Cell（SYS6020）Injection Intravenous infusion
otherNames: BCMA Chimeric Antigen Receptor T Cell（SYS6020）Injection

primaryOutcomes.measure: The frequency and nature of DLT and the incidence of all adverse events and serious adverse events
primaryOutcomes.description: Assess safety and tolerability of SYS6020 in patients with systemic lupus erythematosus

primaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of participants who achieved systemic lupus erythematosus remission (DORIS).
primaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of participants who achieved systemic lupus erythematosus remission (DORIS) at 6 months.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of participants who achieved systemic lupus erythematosus remission (DORIS)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of participants who achieved systemic lupus erythematosus remission (DORIS)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of participants with complete reduction of hormone dose
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of participants with complete reduction of hormone dose

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of participants taking ≤5mg/ day of hormone
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of participants taking ≤5mg/ day of hormone

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of participants achieving low disease activity status (LLDAS)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of participants achieving low disease activity status (LLDAS)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Absolute and percentage changes from baseline in SLEDA1-2K, BILAG-2004 and PGA scores
secondaryOutcomes.description: Absolute and percentage changes from baseline in SLEDA1-2K, BILAG-2004 and PGA scores

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes from baseline in antinuclear antibody, anti-ds-DNA antibody, anti-Smith antibody, C3, C4, and 24-hour urinary protein
secondaryOutcomes.description: Changes from baseline in antinuclear antibody, anti-ds-DNA antibody, anti-Smith

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes of immunoglobulin (IgG, IgM, IgA, IgE) from baseline
secondaryOutcomes.description: Changes of immunoglobulin (IgG, IgM, IgA, IgE) from baseline

secondaryOutcomes.measure: BCMA CAR+ gene copy numberCAR gene copies
secondaryOutcomes.description: BCMA CAR+ gene copy numberCAR gene copies

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Incidence of all adverse events and serious adverse events
secondaryOutcomes.description: Incidence of all adverse events and serious adverse events
